long_desc.thetext: Thanks of the report, I'll follow up.

Fix and tests are here: http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?id=c069cc4506b3626fae6e7b8df718ce627f93529a.
Fix is to align with the old F & G integration with respect to what to do when freshInfereneContext() returns null.
See also bug 432348 comment 11, which only has a slight offset in line numbers ...
Verified for 4.5 M4 using build I20141208-2000
